name: MoreCompany
description: A stable lobby player count expansion mod. With cosmetics!

name: Skinwalkers
description: The monsters have learned how to mimic the voices of your friends.

name: SellMyScrap
description: Adds a few terminal commands to sell your scrap from the ship. Highly Configurable. SellFromTerminal +

name: SellTracker
description: Displays your quota and the calculated value of the scrap you are currently selling on a new screen at the company building. (Now with configurable colors)

name: LC_API
description: Multipurpose modding API for Lethal Company

name: TooManyEmotes
description: Adds over 200 new emotes! Emote wheel included! Allows Masked Enemies to emote, Implements a system for purchasing them on the store (optional), and much more!

name: ReservedItemSlotCore
description: The core mod for all ReservedItemSlot mods. Adds functionality for all ReservedItemSlot mods.

name: ReservedWalkieSlot
description: Gives a free, dedicated Walkie slot on the right side of your screen. You can press [X] to activate and speak into the Walkie at anytime.

name: ShipLoot
description: Reliably shows the total value of all scrap in your ship.

name: Helmet_Cameras
description: For monitoring first person cameras on player's helmets. For best "Camera Man" experience.

name: AdditionalContentFramework
description: Acts as a module loader for other mods, allowing you to easily add your own custom items to Lethal Company!

name: AdditionalSuits
description: Adds 8 more standard suits to your initial closet at the start of the game! Great for organizing larger crews! Follow my socials in the desc to stay in the loop for updates and new mods for Lethal Company! (source code is also in desc <3)

name: MaskedEnemyOverhaul
description: Removes the mask from the mimic enemy, wears a suit of a random player (even modded ones), allows spawning on all moons without needing the mask items, and a zombie apocalypse?

name: SellMyScrap
description: Adds a few terminal commands to sell your scrap from the ship. Highly Configurable. SellFromTerminal +
